columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the DNS zone.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a DNS zone uniquely.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the DNS zone.

columns.name: max_number_of_record_sets
columns.description: The maximum number of record sets that can be created in this DNS zone.

columns.name: max_number_of_records_per_record_set
columns.description: The maximum number of records per record set that can be created in this DNS zone.

columns.name: number_of_record_sets
columns.description: The current number of record sets in this DNS zone.

columns.name: name_servers
columns.description: The name servers for this DNS zone.

columns.name: zone_type
columns.description: The type of this DNS zone (always `Public`, see `azure_private_dns_zone` table for private DNS zones).

columns.name: registration_virtual_networks
columns.description: A list of references to virtual networks that register hostnames in this DNS zone.

columns.name: resolution_virtual_networks
columns.description: A list of references to virtual networks that resolve records in this DNS zone.
